content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-288-02-B
|Item_parent=Hemorrhoidal pathology
|Item_parent_short=Hemorrhoidal pathology
|Rank=B
|Title=Knowing the frequency of haemorrhoidal pathology
|Description=
|Rubric=Epidemiology
|Contributors=
|Order=2}}

It is estimated that a third of the French adult population has had at least one haemorrhoidal symptom in the past year, but only a third have sought medical advice.

question.title: Question
question.description: What percentage of the French adult population has had at least one haemorrhoidal symptom in the past year?

option_a.title: Option A
option_a.description: Two-thirds of the French adult population

option_b.title: Option B
option_b.description: Only one-third of the French adult population

option_c.title: Option C
option_c.description: A quarter of the French adult population

option_d.title: Option D
option_d.description: The majority of the French adult population
